column1: Vitamin B6 is a water-soluble vitamin.
Water-soluble vitamins dissolve in water so the body cannot store them.
- Keep blood sugar (glucose) in normal ranges.

Vitamin B6 is found in: - Avocado - Banana - Legumes (dried beans) - Beef and pork - Nuts - Poultry - Whole grains and fortified cereals - Corn Fortified breads and cereals may also contain vitamin B6.
The RDA for vitamins may be used to help create goals for each person.
